name: Cyberhorde 2544
description:
It is year 2544. An army of robots from an unknown planet has attacked Earth. You are the only survivor nearby and the robot army is hunting you. How long can you survive?

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D

Shoot: Mouse 1

Dash: Shift

Interact: F

Pistol: 1

Shotgun: 2

Assault Rifle: 3

Credits

Programming: Tuukka Tenhunen, Tomi Oksman

Graphics: Jarno Kananen, Petra Kotajärvi

SFX: Lauri Petäjä

Music: Jarno Kananen

Producer: Lauri Petäjä

This is a school project done in spring 2022 done by Laten Lampaat. This is only a demo.
